casebody.data:
CITIMORTGAGE, INC.
v.
Richard TANASI, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Christopher G. Brown, in support of the petition.

Donald E. Frechette, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 829, 171 A.3d 516 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
